moved.note:
Living 20 minutes into the future. Eccentric weirdo. Virtual Adept. Time traveler. Burnout. Thelemite. Technomage. Hacker on main. APT 3319. BOFH. Not human. 30% software and implants. H+ - 0.4 on the Berram-7 scale. Furry adjacent. Pan/poly. Cyberpunk. Slightly improbable. Making the Net /<-r4d again. My code starts with 4GH. Sburb speedrunner. XKCD 705. Fuck cancer. Certified moopsy handler. Ohtori Academy alumnus. Magneto was right.

(Avatar by Avery Liell-Kok.)
